thread.section_title: Harvey Norman Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Harvey Norman Ireland | harveynorman.ie
thread.title: Ciara Toolis
thread.title_full: Harvey Norman Ireland reviewed by Ciara Toolis

author: Ciara Toolis
title: Ciara Toolis
text: It was my first time to purchase anything in Harvey Norman and it certainly won't be my last. I've recommended them to many people since as I was so impressed with the staff in store and most especially the after care from the Harvey Norman Customer Assist team. I purchased two beds, lockers and dining room chairs. Unfortunately, there were minor issues with some of the items but Michelle and Sophie at Harvey Norman Customer Assist sorted these out with ease. It was simply old fashioned good customer service. I'd highly recommend Harvey Norman and will return as a customer in the future. 5 stars.
